bitenum.description: Standard LCD waveforms on segment and common lines selected
Low-power LCD waveforms on segment and common lines selected
All LCD segments are enabled and on or off according to their corresponding memory location
Blinking of individual segments as enabled in blinking memory register LCDBMx.
Switching between display contents as stored in LCDMx and LCDBMx memory registers.

bitfield.description: Select LCD memory registers for display

bitenum.description: Display content of LCD memory registers LCDMx
Display content of LCD blinking memory registers LCDBMx
Contents of LCD memory registers LCDMx remain unchanged
Clear content of all LCD memory registers LCDMx
Contents of blinking memory registers LCDBMx remain unchanged
Clear content of all blinking memory registers LCDBMx
For 5-mux to 8-mux modes:1/2 bias. For 5-mux to 8-mux modes - 1/4 bias.
V2 to V4 are generated internally
V2 to V4 are sourced externally and the internal bias generator is switched off
V5 is sourced from the R03 pin

bitfield.description: V2 to V4 voltage on external Rx3 pins

bitenum.description: Internally generated V2 to V4 are not switched to pins (LCDEXTBIAS = 0)
Internally generated V2 to V4 are switched to pins (LCDEXTBIAS = 0)
Contents of animation memory registers LCDANMx remain unchanged
Clear content of all animation memory registers LCDANMx
